column5: There were a number of local clubs involved at the Round Table hosted by MP Larry Miller, Special Guest with Fisheries & Oceans Minister Shea & also in attendance MPP Bill Walker, SSA, BPSA, LHFC, Barrow Bay, Sauble Anglers, East Grey, I'm sure I'm missing some if so add your name so everybody knows who was there.Tight Lines SBK  http://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/2014/04/round-table-discussion-with-fisheries.html
